prompt: Who would say this? They're advancing down our weak right flank. For a bunch of soulless machines, they seem to know a thing or two. But we'll see. Yeah. That's a good idea. Any more time spent hanging around here and we're done for. Or we can stay and fight? We may die if we take a stand here. But staying gives us the chance to change our destinies. We have the Monado. With this, the future is ours for the taking! Getting short sighted in your old age, Dickson? I'm fine. Don't worry, I'm still in control. As long as you think you've still got the strength in you, old man. Well I say you're coming with us! What would we do without those? Acknowledged! They'll have to be if they want to beat us. Now, let's even the odds a bit! Dickson, Mumkhar. Let's do this! What does it look like? I'm still good to go! Mumkhar?! What are you doing?! That way is- Dickson, take care of the survivors. Vile Mechon! If you think the Homs, the people of Bionis, are just waiting here for you to pick us off... You are sorely mistaken!

Who would say this? A Mechon M71! I bet I can use its optical system to align one of the Anti-Air Batteries. No good. It's broken. The joint section. It's buckled. It's completely useless. An M69! Its armour would be perfect for making a shield. If I can just get it off, I should be able to...
Who would say this? Shulk!
Who would say this? Reyn! It's not a Mechon! It's just a Krabble! It was using the Mechon armour as a shell!
Who would say this? I'll lure it away and Topple it! When it's down, use your Arts to finish it off!
Who would say this? Thanks, Reyn. That was a close one.
Who would say this? Man, what were you doing wandering off by yourself? Stay where I can keep an eye on you. It's pretty dangerous outside of the colony. There are all kinds of monsters.
Who would say this? Yeah. But thanks to you, we got its shell. Everyone in the colony's gonna be really happy.
Who would say this? I'm more worried about you than the shell. Ah...whatever. Knowing what you're like, at least you'll make a decent weapon out of it. This Scrap Driver's excellent.
Who would say this? I just learned by watching Dickson make weapons.
Who would say this? 'Course, Dunban's weapon still beats them all.
Who would say this? The Monado... I hope I can figure out the secret of its power one day.
Who would say this? You will, Shulk. Anyway, we'd better get back to the colony. If I'm late for drills again, old Square-tache is gonna kill me.
Who would say this? Square-tache? Oh, the Defence Force Colonel. He's pretty scary.
Who would say this? Tell me about it...
Who would say this? Sorry, I didn't mean for you to come all the way out here during your break.
Who would say this? Don't worry about it. Let's get back. Here we are. I'd better stop in at HQ. You off to the Weapon Development Lab?
Who would say this? Yeah, when I've sold any parts I can't use.
Who would say this? All right. See you later.

Who would say this? Uh-oh! The colonel's gonna explode. Same old colonel. At this rate, the men will all be dead before they see any action. Dickson! When did you get back to Colony 9? Your research notes really helped. Well, anyone can activate it. The problem is controlling it. Yes. If anyone other than Dunban were able to control the Monado, we could surpass any military force in the world. It's still only conjecture, but it's starting to look like the Monado might be something far more significant than just a weapon for defeating Mechon. It's the symbol that appears in the centre when it's activated. What I know is, the central piece is made from multilayered glass. The symbol appears on the top layer. And each layer is constructed differently. Which means... If we could just unlock the Monado's power...
Who would say this? Dunban! Dunban!
Who would say this? Dunban!
Who would say this? Don't look like that. I haven't gone yet. Shulk... It was the Monado. It was...controlling me... Even so... It saved us...saved our future... Next...it will be up to you...
Who would say this? Dunban... OK then. I'll see you later.
Who would say this? Dunban, are you awake yet?
Who would say this? Is it time to eat already? You didn't have to bring it yourself. You could have just called me.
Who would say this? Don't be silly! Do you want me to feed you?
Who would say this? Don't treat me like an invalid. I'm better than I was a year ago.
Who would say this? Much better. I really thought I lost you back then...
Who would say this? Yes. But now I'm almost well enough to handle the Monado again.
Who would say this? Dunban, don't say that! The Mechon have gone now! Why would you say that?!
Who would say this? I just mean I'm prepared. Sorry.
Who would say this? OK. More importantly, eat up before it gets cold. I made something really special today.
Who would say this? Don't feel like you need to stay here then, Fiora. Go and make your next delivery. Well, I'm sure you'd like Shulk to try some while it's still hot?
Who would say this? That's OK. Shulk has no sense of taste. He'll say it's delicious even if it's stone cold.
Who would say this? In which case today he would actually mean it.

Who would say this? I'm fine, Fiora. Off you go.
Who would say this? OK. Dunban... Thanks.
Who would say this? I'm not finished yet. I have to be prepared to use the Monado again.

Who would say this? The Monado... It's the only sword that's effective against the Mechon armour. They say that before time began, it was wielded by the Bionis. The same Bionis that we all live on. It must have a secret. That's how Dunban was able to destroy so many Mechon. And why he lost the use of his right arm. If I can just unlock the secret of its power...
Who would say this? Shulk!
Who would say this? Fiora! This is great! It tastes so good!
Who would say this? Really?

Who would say this? Yeah. I'd forgotten what it feels like. I never thought it could be so quiet here.

Who would say this? I know, man. I just wanted to touch it. I didn't know it would do that. Sorry. But is it true? The Monado really can't cut people?

Who would say this? Well, if I can find a way to increase the number of symbols, I should...
Who would say this? I'm sure that's all very clever. But! Why were you more worried about a machine than me, Shulk?!

Who would say this? Sorry! So of course I want to get my revenge! No!
Who would say this? Shulk! Shulk!

Who would say this? Reyn, Fiora...
Who would say this? Are you OK? Does it hurt?

Who would say this? You know... Like, a blue blade made of light came out. Same as just now.

Who would say this? Anyway, the point is, I'm fine. To be honest, this has happened a few times before. I've been researching the Monado for a long time.

Who would say this? Well, whether he hit me is neither here nor there, really... Although actually he did end up hitting me. And that ain't all. He made me do a thousand squats and sit-ups.
Who would say this? Whoa, nasty.
Who would say this? Yeah. And now I have to go all the way to the Mag Mell Ruins and back.

Who would say this? That's the one! They're used to power the mobile artillery. It looks like the damage's been repaired. But it can't move without the ether energy. And it seems like the fuelling station's all out of stock.

Who would say this? Yeah. OK, I'll go with you.

Who would say this? I'll be fine. I can take care of myself.

Who would say this? Right. And Colony 9's Anti-Air Batteries and mobile artillery are standardised for these cylinders, so they can be used straight away.

Who would say this? But I'll solve it one day and show you. If it's just technology that someone created in the past, it's not incomprehensible. We'll come to understand it one day.
Who would say this? Don't go trying too hard. We can come and get Ether Cylinders whenever we need them. Besides, it's a good place for Defence Force training.

Who would say this? After that battle, many of my friends did not make it home. While I was being brought here on that stretcher, they were all I thought about. But I decided I would not cry. Everyone who died in that war had something they wanted to protect. Family, friends, loved ones, their home... So they fought to protect them. And we won. No matter how painful, no matter how hard, it's nothing to be sad about... I decided that there and then.
Who would say this? Dunban!
Who would say this? Shulk, Fiora would tell you the same thing. She wanted to protect us. Or rather, she wanted to protect you. And you're alive now. So I will not cry.
Who would say this? OK.
Who would say this? Remember the gift of life that Fiora gave you, and treasure it.
Who would say this? I...I can't say that I understand. But...I hope to, some day.

Who would say this? I've made a decision.
Who would say this? Huh?

Who would say this? Shulk...
Who would say this? They attacked our colony, killed Fiora. I will find that Mechon - find it and destroy it. Destroy them all! What are you laughing at?

Who would say this? Colony 6 is on the way to Sword Valley, where there's supposed to be a Mechon base. If that's where they came from, maybe the people in Colony 6 saw something.
Who would say this? Good point. They might even know something about that metal-faced Mechon. So we go past the Mag Mell Ruins and up through Tephra Cave. Then we should arrive at the Bionis' knee.
Who would say this? Yeah. And if we can get to the knee, it ain't far to Colony 6, right?
Who would say this? Sounds like a plan! Let's head to Colony 6. This door... It was closed when we came past before, but it's open now.
Who would say this? Maybe it was programmed to open up in case of Mechon emergency. The way to the Bionis' knee is just ahead. You ready?
Who would say this? Yeah, let's go. An ether lamp.

Who would say this? Yeah. We can follow them to the Bionis' knee.

Who would say this? Oh, right. What's born from the Bionis is returned to the Bionis. That's the way of the Homs. That was way harder than I thought it'd be. I'm just about ready to collapse!
Who would say this? Let's take a rest. If the monsters in here killed all these traders, we need to be at our best. I'm wide awake, so I'll take first watch.

Who would say this? Awake already?
Who would say this? Didn't sleep a wink. And I still feel like I just did one of Vangarre's drills!
Who would say this? Heh.

Who would say this? Hey... Why do you think the Mechon attacked? Are we just food to them? Or, what, did we do something wrong? Sort of reminds me of the battle between the Bionis and the Mechonis. I wonder if it's anything to do with that?
Who would say this? Well... It's hard to believe that living things are just a source of energy for machines. There has to be another reason.
Who would say this? The Mechon killed Fiora.
Who would say this? Yeah.
Who would say this? You know what? I'll never forgive 'em. I don't care what their reason is.

There was a blizzard or something and your mum and dad died. And then Dickson found you and brought you back.

Who would say this? You will pay for what you've done! You will know the pain and suffering you caused the Emperor and Fiora! A silver-faced Mechon... And who was that girl? You don't know how to- A new symbol! That was amazing! What was that light? I... control it. By the light of the Monado, I will stop them. Thank you. Hey, wait a second! More importantly, where on Bionis did you learn to use the Monado? A girl? Alvis. How do you know so much about the Monado? Who are you?

Zanza must realise it is now a double-edged sword. And what reason could he have for choosing the boy? What is this? I am experiencing feelings for the boy? Vanea. Your swift repairs are appreciated. I wish to see that boy again. To meet with the one who wields the Monado. Is Egil aware of my reawakening? Then there is no need to worry. I shall meet the boy. Besides, the Monado will draw him to me.
Who would say this? I could go for a hot cup of Dickson's homebrew right about now. We're not built for this cold.
Who would say this? Riki hate cold!
Who would say this? This can't be nice for Riki. He's from Makna.
Who would say this? A little further down is Sword Valley, right? Me?
Who would say this? Riki see it! Bigger than big tree in village!

Who would say this? Alvis? This the place you meant? Been away?
Who would say this? Throw hot water on ice!
Who would say this? Yeah, nice one genius!

Who would say this? Sounds good. Start looking for a geyser, everyone.

Who would say this? This place...

Who would say this? What? Must be tired. Don't worry. Wait, you mean...! So this is where the Monado was kept? My dad took it from here... Have you always been able to see the future? You told me you are from a long line of seers. Did you have the ability from birth? And the ceremony was held right here. I hadn't really thought about it. After I grabbed the Monado, I just saw things. You mean the Monado. My visions, under the same principle, are there to disrupt the future. The future would be changed. Is that how Zanza planned to defeat the Mechonis? But why go to such lengths? What happened all those years ago? I used to only believe in what I could see. My home, my friends, the Monado itself! I knew those things were real. Are you saying I should stop?
Who would say this? I can't feel my face or feet. What do you think?
Who would say this? Reyn not tell truth! Reyn's snoring make Riki think of Orluga!
Who would say this? Oi! I don't snore!
Who would say this? That Mechon! It is you.
Who would say this? Hey, that's Fiora!
Who would say this? Young Heir to the Monado. We meet again.
Who would say this? Fiora!
Who would say this? Fiora? Is that my name? Then you... You know this body?
Who would say this? So it's true. You really don't remember us at all. Fiora, listen! If nothing else, you must remember your family! That's Dunban over there!
Who would say this? Family? There is family... Wielder of the Monado. There is...a matter I must speak to you about.
Who would say this? Fiora!
Who would say this? What was that?!
Who would say this? Metal Face!
Who would say this? Stay alert!
Who would say this? You killed my father!
Who would say this? Get him!
Who would say this? Get away from her! You!
Who would say this? You're disgusting!
Who would say this? All right. You can have it. But only if you let her go.
Who would say this? But you're-
Who would say this? Is that...?

Who would say this? We will not bow to you!
Who would say this? Melly hit bad guy in face!
Who would say this? You're a traitor, Mumkhar. And you're not getting away. You fought beside me at Sword Valley! Why did you change sides? Why the Mechon?
Who would say this? What's happening?!
Who would say this? Is the Bionis moving?!

Who would say this? Is that it?! That's the puerile reason you've killed all those innocent people? Ravaged our home! Never. I will strike you down and all that you have become, you wretched fool. The Monado will stop you. And then you will know the shame of all that you have done, traitor!
Who would say this? That light!
Who would say this? What the?!

Who would say this? It's not like the other Mechon. Leader of Mechonis. So you're the one who controls the Mechon! Why?! Why do you trap Homs in machines? What do you want from us? Why make us fight for you?!
Who would say this? Fiora!
Who would say this? Get your hands off her! Fiora!
Who would say this? Mumkhar!
Who would say this? We're coming. And we won't give up! Fiora, we will find you! Fiora! Fiora.
Who would say this? Shulk...
Who would say this? She's...

Who would say this? Get it together! Shulk! We ain't got time to be hanging around here! I dunno what's happened to her, but that was Fiora. No doubt about it. You know what that means?! She ain't dead! We've gotta get her back!
Who would say this? Get her back... Right! We've come too far to give up now!
Who would say this? Then we'll go to Mechonis! And find Fiora!
Who would say this? Yes. We will get Fiora back.
Who would say this? Whoa! What the?!

Who would say this? The sword of the Mechonis.
Who would say this? The entire valley below... The whole thing is its sword!
Who would say this? Something seems unnatural.
Who would say this? What do you mean?

Who would say this? By the fortress! It should just be up ahead.
Who would say this? Father once told me that the Mechonis absorbs the ether of the Bionis and uses it for sustenance.
Who would say this? So the Mechonis feeds off ether. Then undoubtedly the ether serves as the Mechon's energy source as well.
Who would say this? It looks so big, even from this distance. The fortress must be enormous.
Who would say this? Galahad Fortress - the front line base of the Mechon. The Mechon that attack Bionis must all come from here.
Who would say this? Then there's a high probability that he's there. The golden Mechon that took Fiora. We're about to enter the Mechon stronghold. If there's anyone who wants to turn back now...
Who would say this? Shulk. Friend should no split up. No leave friend behind. Riki scared but Riki want go too.
Who would say this? Riki.
Who would say this? He's right. OK, let's go.
Who would say this? Yes!
Who would say this? What's that?
Who would say this? You arranged this for us?
Who would say this? Hey, it's...!
Who would say this? Dickson!
Who would say this? What are you doing here?
Who would say this? Yeah! I was hoping for some new stuff!
Who would say this? You cheap old man! Yes. They made Mumkhar into one. He was the one who attacked Colony 9. Aren't you surprised?
Who would say this? Sorry? Thanks for coming this far. We'll be fine. We can handle ourselves.

Who would say this? Agreed. We will infiltrate via the ether inlets. If I'm right and the Mechon do feed off ether... Then we're sure to find some form of influx channel. Our objective is to reach one of those channels.

Who would say this? Looks like it's just us.
Who would say this? Right! We head for the hilt of the sword - Galahad Fortress.
Who would say this? OK!
Who would say this? One year on. Now, at last, we will seize our destiny. Isn't that right, Shulk?

Who would say this? Now's our chance, Dunban.
Who would say this? Yes. But don't lower your guard. The Mechon may just be hiding. Mumkhar! How could you? How could you do this to your own kind?!
Who would say this? Oi, beardy! You're talkin' pretty tough there! Don't be so sure you can take us all on by yourself!
Who would say this? What's that sound?!
Who would say this? You scumbag!

Who would say this? Shulk!
Who would say this? Everyone! Watch out for the green claws! And the other ones' spears! There's something different about them!
Who would say this? How can that be?!
Who would say this? You monsters!
Who would say this? Mumkhar! You're gonna pay! Yes. This is the power of the Monado! You wanted it, so now you can have it, Mumkhar! Die!
Who would say this? Stop!

Who would say this? It's Mumkhar... He's not a Mechon!

Who would say this? Shulk! No!

Who would say this? It's been a long time since I last had this dream. I reached out for the piece of scrap metal. And then I fell into the ground. Was I... Was I dreaming? Fiora! What's that? Fiora! Fiora! She's still breathing! Wake up. Come on! Wake up! She needs water. Fiora. You're awake. Do you remember? My name is Shu-
Who would say this? I can't believe it. My first kiss.
Who would say this? You do remember me! Fiora!
Who would say this? Of course I do. Shulk. I... I never forgot you, or the others.
Who would say this? Then, why?
Who would say this? Because I wasn't me anymore. I wanted to call out, but I couldn't.
Who would say this? What do you mean?

Who would say this? When it happened, when Colony 9 was attacked by the Mechon... I thought I had died. I felt the Mechon's claw rip through me. I couldn't remember anything. There was no sound, no light, no pain. When I came round, I had the body of a machine. And it felt like there was someone inside me.
Who would say this? Someone else? The one who was controlling the Mechon you were in?
Who would say this? Yes, that voice. But I could still see and hear. I was there all the time. Except I had no control over my body, and I couldn't talk.
Who would say this? And that's why it seemed like you didn't recognise us.
Who would say this? Yes. Inside my heart, I was crying out desperately. But you didn't hear me. Nobody did.
Who would say this? We always believed it was you.
Who would say this? It's OK. You don't have to say that. I know it would have confused me.
Who would say this? But the person inside you... Do you know who it was?
Who would say this? No. I heard her voice when she spoke, but I didn't know what she was thinking. There was something she urgently needed to do. I understood that much.
Who would say this? What do you think happened to her?
Who would say this? Maybe she's sleeping. Or maybe she's trapped like I was.
Who would say this? I hope she stays trapped. Hijacking your body, treating it like it's her own.
Who would say this? I guess.

Who would say this? Shulk? I don't think she's totally to blame.
Who would say this? Why not?
Who would say this? She needed my body for something. I don't know what it was. I just know it was important. I want to help.
Who would say this? Why would you?
Who would say this? I knew she was using my body, but I didn't hate her for it. She was kind. She was taking care of my body. I could feel it.
Who would say this? Really?
Who would say this? Yeah. And she did everything she could to protect you.
Who would say this? So back when we were fighting...
Who would say this? Against Egil. She knew what I wanted to do and did it for me. So I want to help her if I can. Please, Shulk.
Who would say this? All right. Then we'll do everything we can to find out what she was trying to do.
Who would say this? Thank you.
Who would say this? Welcome back, Fiora.

Who would say this? We have to find the others. I know they're alive. I can feel it. Everyone's gonna be surprised when they see you.
Who would say this? Everyone being...
Who would say this? Reyn, Dunban, and there are a few others we met along the way. Sharla, Riki and Melia. I just know you're gonna like them.

Who would say this? It's OK. We can take a break here. I wonder what happened. After the fortress. Where did the others all end up? The Monado's light is fluctuating. That Mechon really messed it up. But still. I have to protect Fiora.
Who would say this? Shulk? Can't you sleep?
Who would say this? Sorry. Did I wake you?

Who would say this? You want to eat? You must be hungry.
Who would say this? No thanks. But I'd like some water.
Who would say this? OK. You should eat. Even if you're not hungry. You need to get your strength back.

Who would say this? No, I'm fine. This body has its uses. I never need to eat. I never get hungry. I just run on water. Don't worry. I prefer my old body, but this one has some advantages. Shulk. You can leave me. It's OK.
Who would say this? What?!
Who would say this? I mean, look at me, Shulk. This body is a Mechon body. So I should live here on Mechonis. This is where I belong.
Who would say this? You don't have to do that.

Who would say this? But I can see it's not true! I mean... You're right here! I'll never forget how I felt when I thought I'd lost you back at the colony. I should have done something! I thought, if only I had the power to save you.
Who would say this? Shulk...
Who would say this? No. No more regrets. I will protect you. Besides, there's someone else inside your head. We can't leave her there.
Who would say this? I guess not.
Who would say this? Mechon! No! Not now!
Who would say this? Shulk! Let me...

Who would say this? Fiora! Right. Come on, Monado. Don't let me down. No! I won't let you take her from me! This time, I will protect Fiora! Yes! The Monado's light! I can do this! The Monado... It worked, but... I feel worse than before. Whatever he did to the Monado is... What's that sound? No! We're surrounded!
Who would say this? Where are we?
Who would say this? You're up then?
Who would say this? Sharla! What happened to us?
Who would say this? I don't know. I've only just come round.

Who would say this? I looked for them, but they're nowhere to be seen.
Who would say this? Oh.
Who would say this? Reyn, thanks.
Who would say this? Huh?
Who would say this? For protecting me, back there.

Who would say this? What is it?

Who would say this? You promised to protect the guy who protects you? Am I missing something?

Who would say this? In the old days, Shulk was kinda frail. You know, like a little Bunniv that gets bossed around by the other colony animals. It was me who used to be there, to save him. That's why I promised Fiora. But now look at me.
Who would say this? Reyn.
Who would say this? He's stronger now. And not just 'cos he's got the Monado. I've done all I can to help him. He doesn't need me.
Who would say this? That's not the Reyn I know. Do you remember Colony 6?
Who would say this? Yeah.
Who would say this? The Mechon were always on the doorstep of our home, the colony. Thinking about it, I realise they were after the ether underneath it.
Who would say this? Yeah. I suppose so. If they could stockpile energy from there, they could get to any part of Bionis.

Who would say this? The Colony 6 defence force suffered its fair share of pain. And not just physical. Friends and family...alive one day... gone the next. It all became so normal. You end up wondering how you can possibly make a difference when war is so futile. I'm not the only one who felt like that sometimes. But nobody ever gave up. And you know why?
Who would say this? Because you were strong?

Who would say this? We had no choice but to be strong. Everybody had someone to protect. The moment you looked away, you'd lose everyone you loved. So we had to keep looking straight ahead. We couldn't stop fighting.
Who would say this? Man, that's tough. Puts my problems into perspective. I suppose I should get back to being Reyn.
Who would say this? Don't go doubting yourself, even if things get tough.
Who would say this? You're right. There'll be plenty of time to stare at my feet when I'm old and crooked. Get it?
Who would say this? I get it. So now what?

Who would say this? Back there, were you talking about that guy Gadolt?
Who would say this? Not just about him. Why do you ask?
Who would say this? Nothing. Just... You know... Seems like tough competition for a guy like me.
Who would say this? Reyn. Do you think Shulk and the others are OK?
Who would say this? 'Course they are. They wouldn't die from something like that.

Who would say this? Someone's in a fight! Up ahead! Shulk!
Who would say this? Reyn?
Who would say this? I got your back. We'll turn them into scrap!
Who would say this? Right!

Who would say this? Thanks to you!
Who would say this? Reyn! Reyn, it's you!
Who would say this? Fiora! She remembers us!
Who would say this? Yeah. She's been through a lot.
Who would say this? I can see.
Who would say this? If only we could find Dunban.
Who would say this? Yeah, he'll be blubbering at the sight of us.
Who would say this? Hahaha! I don't think he'd ever cry in front of you two.

Who would say this? When no one's watching?
Who would say this? Yep. He's always been like that. He's a big softy, but he hates anyone seeing it.
Who would say this? I never knew.
Who would say this? Nope! I don't believe it!
Who would say this? Take it easy.
Who would say this? I'm OK. I want to see my brother. Let's go, Shulk.

Who would say this? In ancient times, when the Bionis and the Mechonis came into existence, I was born as well. Just as the Bionis had a soul, I came to exist in this world as the soul of the Mechonis. I created my children on Mechonis and acquired this body. They called themselves Machina. And Mechonis was transformed into a world brimming with life. The Machina gave rise to an advanced civilization and built this great city.

Who would say this? They lived their lives in peace and harmony. The gentle Machina worshipped me. Life also flourished on Bionis. The Machina generously shared the fruits of their civilization with the peoples of the Bionis. They believed their two worlds would grow, hand in hand. Then a terrible fate descended on them from above.

Who would say this? Taking advantage of my final blow to the Bionis, its beings took Zanza and sealed him firmly away. However, the battle with Zanza had greatly consumed my life force. I warned the surviving Machina that the Bionis had not yet been destroyed, and that one day he would be released.
Who would say this? I'm the one who released him!

Who would say this? I then entered a long and deep slumber, in preparation for Zanza's inevitable reawakening. It's all clear to me. What you wanted to do. Stop the battle between the Bionis and the Mechonis.
